net.metro.systemobjects.dataobjects

Class DataType

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.metro.systemobjects.dataobjects.DataType

  • public class DataType
extends java.lang.Object
    Object to define the class of data that a specific Data object is. It also defines the type of data that it is:
    DataType.POINT for data types that are intended to be painted at stops only (like boardings and alightings)
    DataType.SEGMENT for data types that are intended to be painted at and in between stops (like load)
    Author:
    Sean

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static DataType ALIGHTINGS
      DataType object for alightings, the amount of people exiting a bus at a specific stop.
      static DataType BOARDINGS
      DataType object for boardings, the amount of people entering a bus at a specific stop.
      static DataType LOAD
      DataType object for load, the amount of people on a bus between two stops.
      private java.lang.String name 
      static int POINT 
      static int SEGEMENT 
      private int type
